channel.description: Recent content in timeseries on r-econometrics

item.title: Time Series Topics
item.description: Work in progress (July 2019). I will try to update this page over the next few months. This section is intended to provide an overview of the relevant issues in (macro)economic time series analysis. Again the standard disclaimer: This site does not replace a good textbook, but it should help you to get a grasp of the basic concepts more quickly than if you learned it on your own.
